verses.name: Judges 20:27
verses.text: And the children of Israel enquired of the Lord, (for the ark of the covenant of God was there in those days,

verses.name: Judges 20:28
verses.text: And Phinehas, the son of Eleazar, the son of Aaron, stood before it in those days,) saying, Shall I yet again go out to battle against the children of Benjamin my brother, or shall I cease? And the Lord said, Go up; for to morrow I will deliver them into thine hand.

verses.name: Judges 20:29
verses.text: And Israel set liers in wait round about Gibeah.
